text: Ali Kemal Denizci (born 1 March 1950) is a Turkish former football manager and player who played as a winger and was best known for his stint with Trabzonspor. He was nicknamed Fırtına Kemal (English: Storm Kemal) because of his lightning pace. ==Professional career== Ali Kemal joined Trabzonspor in 1972 after a couple seasons of playing amateur football. He helped the team get promoted to the Süper Lig for the first time in their history, and was their superstar player when they won their first two Süper Lig titles in the 1975–76, and 1976–77 seasons. In 1978, Trabzonspor had to sell him to cover their revenues and he moved to Fenerbahçe, causing the Trabzonspor fans to riot in the streets. Ali Kemal ended his career with Beşiktaş where he won the 1981–82 1.Lig, and he played his final game in 1983 against his former club Trabzonspor. ==International career== Ali Kemal was the first-ever Trabzonspor player to play for the Turkey national football team.http://topraksaha.net/04/2016/biz-sorduk-trabzonsporun-firtina-acigi-ali- kemal-denizci-cevapladi/ He made 27 appearances for Turkey, scoring 3 times. ==Personal life== Ali Kemal's brother, Osman Denizci, was also a professional footballer in the Süper Lig, who played alongside him in Fenerbahçe. ==Honours== ;Trabzonspor *Süper Lig (2): 1975–76, 1976–77 *Turkish Cup (3): 1976–77, 1977–78 *Turkish Super Cup (3): 1976, 1977, 1978 ;Fenerbahçe *Turkish Cup (1): 1978-1979 *TSYD Cup (3): 1979, 1980, 1981 ;Beşiktaş *Süper Lig (1): 1981–1982 ==References== ==External links== * * TFF Manager Profile * * Mackolik Manager Profile Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Trabzon Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkey international footballers Category:Turkish football managers Category:Trabzonspor footballers Category:Fenerbahçe S.K. footballers Category:Beşiktaş J.K. footballers Category:Süper Lig players Category:TFF First League players Category:Kartalspor managers Category:Kardemir Karabükspor managers Category:İstanbulspor managers Category:Hatayspor managers Category:Boluspor managers Category:Çaykur Rizespor managers Category:Trabzonspor managers Category:Elazığspor managers Category:Süper Lig managers Category:Association football wingers
title: Ali Kemal Denizci
